Question: Shenzhen Moke Technology Co., Ltd. CES 2024 product highlight and specification
Summary:
Shenzhen Moke Technology Co., Ltd.

Product: Unveiling latest consumer electronic products and innovative technologies at CES 2024
- Focus on AI, mixed reality, and intelligent vehicles
